body:
The new story seems to deviate from the older original series. The title and product description mentions that this is set in the future. The exam papers indicate that this is around Winter with Ruri now in Highschool. 

The taller brother is named Satoru, while the smaller character on the second half of this doujin is Haru (The New Nitamonodoshi Artbook by Honryou Hanaru depicts him as a meek yellow-eyed character. Mostly interacts with Ruri in a scrapped manuscript titled “Haruri”, which you can find in his Fanbox two years ago (2020). There seems to be a falling out between the Satoru and Ruri, leading to these twist of events?
The art style reminds of the manga "This Girl is Not Just Cute"
this art style is so cute
